about_the_game:
House of Witches is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will find an exciting story about the life of two lesbian witches who love sex very much. The game is filled with scenes of sex, humor and romance.

In this great game you have to immerse yourself in the story of two very sexy witches. They are both lesbians and they really like to have sex. The story begins with the fact that one witch returns home after a long absence... What happened next you will see in the game. Get real enjoyment from very simple gameplay and cool music.

Beautiful graphics!
Relaxing music!
Exciting sex scenes!

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

name: House of Witches

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
